yes: Did you use the standard Ubuntu installer to install to the external drive?
Is the external drive larger or smaller than the internal?
I would boot into an Ubuntu LiveCD, use gparted to copy your Ubuntu partition to your internal drive, then re-install grub following these instructions: http://grub.enbug.org/Grub2LiveCdInstallGuide
Assuming that you don't have too much data on the external drive's filesystem for gparted to resize it to fit in the internal.
